name: Ball Vader MAX
summary:
‘Ballvader MAX’ is a wall-breaking arcade game with simple controls and can be enjoyed by everyone. ‘Ballvader MAX’ is set in space and boasts amazing graphics, the user controls the angle of the ball and fires the ball to earn points. 
 
The first among wall-breaking games to add floating objects. Also, users can compare their scores with others, allowing them to immerse themselves further into the game.
